_header: Return for shame return return again
_description: On unfaithfulness, by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy (abab)

BLHar682.First Lines:
REtorne for shame retorne retorne ageyneHye not to fast parde ye
                    gon amys…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…That ye are made as men of flesshe & bloodWhi make ye
                    towgh to com where ye shulde be
BLHar682.Note: In last line “to” added above the line.
